content: next shadow wrapped stitch and turn row 4 ws purl across to the triplet stitch purl it as one stitch then work tpsw in next shadow wrapped stitch and turn repeat row 3 and 4 until there is one triplet stitch left on each side having just completed row 4 knit across heel stitches including last triplet stitch on the left side note i usually knit the first couple of stitches tight and with both yarns held together to prevent holes continue on to instep working one complete round still in color a knitting that last triplet stitch on right side of heel as one stitch then start decreasing the gusset stitches out until back to the original stitch count while also fading back to color b as follows color a round 1 ssk knit gusset stitches sm work instep sm knit to 2 st from end on instep k2tog knit to end of round heel side stitches color a round 2 work without decreasing knitting all stitches ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 3 repeat round 1 in color a attach color b and repeat round 2 in color b repeat rounds 1-2 in color a twice repeat rounds 1-2 in color b repeat rounds 1-2 in color a this should complete your gusset decreases knit 1 round in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 1 round in color a cut color a after this round leg continue knitting every round in color b until1 5 to 2 shorter than desired leg length then fade back to color a and work cuff in color a as follows attach color a and knit 1 round in color a knit 4 rounds in color b knit 2 rounds in color a knit 3 rounds in color b knit 3 rounds in color a knit 2 rounds in color b knit 4 rounds in color a knit 1 round in color b cut color b knit 5 rounds in color a cuff work 1x1 rib cuff in color a for 20 rounds or until desired length my preferred bind off for toe up socks is thesuspendedbind off not too flarey just the right amount of stretch cuff down instructions cuff with color a using thegerman twisted cast-on or other stretchy cast on cast on 56 60 64 68 72 76 stitches join in the round being careful not to twist stitches work 1x1 rib for 20 rounds or desired length leg knit 5 rounds plain in color a then work fadeto color b as follows attach color b and knit 1 round in color b ©2022 holly isaac for personal use only hollyisaac on ravelry pattern support hollymocha3@gmail com 4 knit 4 rounds color a knit 2 rounds color b knit 3 rounds color a knit 3 rounds color b knit 2 rounds color a knit 4 rounds color
